featured.text: What does the word rescued in the second paragraph mean? (A) recovered (B) prescribed (C) examined (D) discovered 45.
He immediately rushed to his microscope and examined the burrs attached on his pants—feeling a lightbulb moment coming on.
The report examines nine countries where a state of war has become the norm.

definition.zh_def: 檢查；仔細觀察或分析某物以了解其狀況或性質。
definition.en_def: To inspect or scrutinize something carefully to understand its condition or nature.
definition.example: The teacher will examine the students' projects for accuracy.
